title: BlipHQ
description:
BlipHQ gets your alerts, notifications, flags and messages directly to your phone via Telegram and Discord.

What sets BlipHQ apart?

- Simple POST request
- Platform independent
- Don't waste time setting up webhook/ chatbot for Discord/ Telegram
- Validate your ChatID and get started!
- Insert tags and get analytics
- Export analytics as .csv

So the next time someone buys your premium plan, server load crosses threshold or your script catches an error, you'll be instantly notified about it!
